Texts.Chs: 若要完全豁免所有星球的效果，你需要对应抗性达到^orange;90%^reset;。假如你所玩的种族自带火系抗性+30%，那么你免疫火系伤害的抗性就仅仅还需要60%，另外这30%火系抗性可以豁免低等的火系伤害，例如沙漠炎热。^cyan;下一页介绍抗性。
Texts.Eng: for immunity to its effects he will ^orange;actually need 90%^reset;. On the other hand, should your race have a bonus against elements you will need ^orange;less resistance^reset; than the normal amount. A race with +30% to Fire Resistance would need -30% to any listed fire effects in order to have immunity. This allows you to have native immunity to minor effects such as desert heat or minor cold. ^cyan;All resistances stack^reset;. (next)

Texts.Chs: 每种伤害都有其对应的抗性，分级如下：轻度20%、中度40%、重度60%。不过需要注意的是，重度气候与其他因素可能会降低你当前的抗性，这就导致你得提升抗性才能应对自如。此外，敌人也有抗性与弱点，有时候它会免疫某种伤害，但另一种属性的伤害对它却是致命的，所以你得多多尝试以得出最佳战术。
Texts.Eng: As a general rule, assume resistance for biome types works as such:   20% / 40% / 60%  (Mild / Moderate / Severe). Note that severe storms and other factors can influence the potency of a biomes effect, so on occasion you will have increased requirements while the event transpires. Also, enemies can also have resistance strengths and weaknesses. Some are utterly immune to particular elements but easily felled by another, so be prepared to experiment.

Texts.Chs: 状态与你不得不说的秘密
Texts.Eng: Effects and You

Texts.Chs: Frackin'Universe状态指南
Texts.Eng: Frackin'Universe Effects

Texts.Chs: FrackinUniverse增加了大量的状态效果。根据情况，可分为有益与有害两种。这本简短的指南或许能够帮助到你。点击下一页继续。
Texts.Eng: FrackinUniverse adds a great number of additional status effects, environmental hazards and environmental interactions. These can be both detrimental or beneficial depending on circumstances. This short guide should help to sort them out for you. Click next page to continue.

Texts.Chs: 请注意，还有许多奇奇怪怪的效果，会使你的探索艰苦万分。总之，请在冒险前做好万分的准备，前戏总是最重要的，如果你不想猫车的话。
Texts.Eng: Note that there are many other effects you can be affected by in your exploration of the universe. Not all of them can be resisted, and some might be resisted by surprising things. Just stay aware...and stay safe.

Texts.Chs: ^yellow;生物软泥^reset;：这种物质通常会在你接触时，黏在你的身上，影响你的行动以及生存能力。该效果常见于原毒星球，可以佩戴^orange;毒系抗性^reset;或^orange;对应属性的护甲^reset;抵御它。
Texts.Eng: ^yellow;Bio Ooze^reset;: This fluid will stick to you, make you ill and affect your movement and survival chances while active. Wearing protection is recommended. Most common on Proto Worlds and a few other select biomes. Can be ^orange;blocked or mitigated with Poison Resistance or Immunity^reset;.

Texts.Chs: ^yellow;焦油^reset;：焦油会严重地影响你的行动能力，不过值得庆幸的是，它不会对你造成任何伤害。你可以佩戴对应属性的护甲抵御它。
Texts.Eng: ^yellow;Black Tar^reset;: Black tar slows you down ^red;a lot^reset; and makes jumping a decent height nearly impossible. It hampers, but does not directly cause damage. You can block it with various armors or produce.

Texts.Chs: ^yellow;沙漠炎热^reset;：沙漠中通常很干燥，炎热会缓慢的减低你的生命值和饥饿值。从中午到日落的这段时间是最糟糕的，夜晚相对凉爽和无害。火系抗性可以帮你抵抗沙漠炎热。
Texts.Eng: ^yellow;Desert Heat^reset;: Deserts are typically dry and non-humid, and their heat will slowly sap your health and food. From noon till sundown, it will be at its worst. Nights are relatively harmless and cool. Underground is colder. You can resist Deserts with Fire Resistance.

Texts.Chs: ^yellow;气体^reset;：这里的气体指的是：氦-3、暗影气体、氢气等弥漫于自身周围的物质。你可以穿着^orange;免疫气体^reset;的护甲抵抗它们。不过有些需要特定对应的防护才可抵御，例如暗影气体需要^orange;暗影系抗性^reset;，毒气则需要大量的^orange;毒系抗性^reset;才可起作用。
Texts.Eng: ^yellow;Gas^reset;: Gas can be both positive (Helium 3) or negative (Shadow Gas, Hydrogen etc) to immerse yourself in. Blocking gas is generally straightforward...^orange;wear something that protects from gas^reset;. However, Some are more specialized. ^orange;Shadow Gas requires Shadow Resistance^reset; and ^orange;Poison Gas is non-functional with high poison resistance^reset;.

Texts.Chs: ^yellow;精神错乱^reset;：你的心理状况不断恶化，使你的自保能力不断下降。一些道具和护甲可以让你抵抗这种状态，如果你有对 ^orange;暗影系和射线系^reset; 的优秀的抗性，你会没事的。
Texts.Eng: ^yellow;Insanity^reset;: A constant degradation of your mental state, insanity saps your ability to protect yourself over a sustained period by draining your Protection. Additionally, it gives a mild bit of damage per tick. Your brain will become muddled and you will hallucinate, and go hungry faster. Augments and armor exist to combat this nasty effect, or you could have decent resistance to ^orange;both Shadow and Cosmic^reset; and you'll be okay.

Texts.Chs: ^yellow;丛林炎热^reset;：很像沙漠中的那种炎热，丛林炎热会使你的生命值饥饿度不断减少。与沙漠炎热不同，你需要物理抗性来抵抗这种效果。
Texts.Eng: ^yellow;Jungle Heat^reset;: Much like deserts, the heat of a Jungle will gradually drain your health and food, and is less severe at night. Unlike Desert Heat, it will take Physical resistance to counter this effect.

Texts.Chs: ^yellow;液氮^reset;：这听上去有些冷对吧，不过只要你有足够高的^orange;冰系抗性^reset;，你就可以跳进去洗澡了。
Texts.Eng: ^yellow;Liquid Nitrogen^reset;: I hear its a bit cold, so stepping in this might just be a crappy idea for fun times. However, you can make it a joyously fun event by simply wearing adequate ^orange;Ice Resistance^reset;.

Texts.Chs: ^yellow;有机液^reset;：这玩意儿或许是你最想要的！它既可以提高你的生命值上限，也可以饱腹，甚至可以洗澡！
Texts.Eng: ^yellow;Organic Soup^reset;: One of the few effects that is actually something you *want*. Organic soup will increase your health total as well as remove the effects of hunger (and even fill you up!). Take a bath in it when you can!

Texts.Chs: ^yellow;毒素^reset;：如此直白的字面意思，我就不用再解释了吧。汞、毒液、食物，腐败之水都是使你中毒的因素。提高你的^orange;毒系抗性^reset;或是穿戴^orange;免疫毒素^reset;的装备都可让你抵御它。你所需的豁免属性会因毒素浓度的提高而提高。
Texts.Eng: ^yellow;Poison^reset;: Fairly self explanatory. You don't want to be poisoned, but some are worse than others. You've got basic poison, mercury poison (which is especially nasty), contaminated water, food poisoning and darkwater poison to name a few. ^orange;Poison immunity or resistance^reset; will do the trick in avoiding this particular set of hazards. Potent poisons require higher amounts of resistance.

Texts.Chs: ^yellow;压强^reset;：这也许是最致命的效果，如果你没有任何防护，它将会短短的几秒钟内^red;杀^reset;了你。幸运的是，这种效果通常出现于气态巨行星。我建议你不要在没有压强防护的情况下登陆气态巨行星，你真的会死的。
Texts.Eng: ^yellow;Pressure^reset;: Perhaps the deadliest of all the status effects, extreme pressure will ^red;definitely kill you in seconds^reset; if you do not have protection. Thankfully, it is found in few places (primarily on Gas Ball biomes). ^orange;Do not risk this environment effect without a protective suit^reset;. You *will* die.

Texts.Chs: ^yellow;原毒^reset;：这种恶劣的效果是一种现于原毒世界的威胁。它会缓慢地消耗你的最大生命值，并最终杀死你。此外，随着时间的推移，它还会降低你的暴击几率和暴击伤害。在你的实验站找出^orange;原毒防护^reset;吧。对应^orange;毒素抗性^reset;。
Texts.Eng: ^yellow;Proto Poison^reset;: This nasty effect is a threat on Proto Worlds. It will slowly sap your maximum health and *will* eventually kill you. Furthermore, it will reduce your critChance and apply damage over time. Seek out ^orange;proto-poison protection^reset; from various gears in your lab stations, ^orange;poison resistance^reset;.

Texts.Chs: ^yellow;脓液^reset;：这种液体我建议你绝对不要喷，如果你触碰到了，它会使你恶心得要吐。你需要提高^orange;物理系抗性^reset;才能更好地保护你。
Texts.Eng: ^yellow;Pus^reset;: This fluid is absolutely repulsive, and even having the stuff on you causes retching and nausea. To traverse it, you will need some sort of ^orange;physical protection^reset;. This acidic bile is not your friend. I recommend against ingesting it.

Texts.Chs: ^yellow;辐射^reset;：对于毫无准备的人来说，辐射可能是相当危险的。这种恶劣的影响会迅速消耗你的生命值和能量。 (消耗的是最大值，不是当前的值) 。当你的最大生命值降到时，你就会猝死...在你猝死之前不会有任何警告，所以在这种环境下请时刻留意自己的状态。你也会更快饿死，风会让事情变得更糟。抵抗辐射需要射线系抗性。
Texts.Eng: ^yellow;Radiation^reset;: Radiation can be rather hazardous to the unprepared. This nasty effect will drain your health and energy rapidly (your max health/energy, not your current amount). If you reach 0 max health, you will die without warning...so do keep an eye on yourself. You will also starve faster. Wind will make things worse for you. Resistance requires Radioactive Resistance.

Texts.Chs: ^yellow;抗性^reset;：抗性多寡确定了各类伤害对于造成损伤的多少，抗性越高，你就越强大！另外弱点也是一个重要的因素，例如，如果你装了^cyan;Frackin_Races^reset;，那么叶族天生就会有火系抗性-50%的惩罚，所以当它的火系抗性为零时，火系伤害对它就会造成额外^orange;50%^reset;的伤害。下一页介绍当你登陆星球时到底可以做什么才能避免它对你的伤害。
Texts.Eng: ^yellow;Resistances^reset;: Your resistance to effects is a pretty big deal. Bear in mind that the higher your value in one of these stats, the less you are affected by various debuffs as well as damage of that type. Your weakness plays a factor too. For example, a Floran with ^cyan;Frackin Races^reset; installed has -50% Fire resistance. So he takes 50% more damage from fire and will need an ^orange;additional 50% resistance^reset; in order to negate the penalty. So, if a world has a 40% resistance requirement (next)

Texts.Chs: ^yellow;硫磺^reset;：硫磺效果真的是令人厌烦，它可以侵蚀你的防御，融化你的血肉。更糟糕的是，在硫磺星球上，你还得对付暴风雨，这样也使得硫磺更加地危险。为了抵御这种效果，你需要^orange;物理系抗性^reset;或^orange;免疫酸^reset;的增益。
Texts.Eng: ^yellow;Sulphuric^reset;: Sulphuric effects can be nasty, rapidly eating your armor and then doing health damage. Worse, on sulphuric worlds you have storms to contend with that make this effect even more dangerous, acid rain and pools of caustic acid! To resist this effect you'll need ^orange;Physical resistance^reset; or an ^orange;acid immunity^reset; effect.

Texts.Chs: ^yellow;温度^reset;：寒冷、炎热、辐射是StarBound原版的负面状态。但在FU里它们则有着更加详细的分类，EPP也无法使你免疫它们，相对的，你则可以提高^cyan;抗性^reset;以应对它们，对应的抗性越高，所受到的伤害就越小，甚至完全免疫。
Texts.Eng: ^yellow;Temperature^reset;: Cold, Heat and Radiation are things from ordinary Starbound, true. But in FU they play a different role. You won't find many Immunity effects on EPP packs. Instead, you'll primarily be using ^cyan;resistances^reset; obtained from them or augments. The higher your resistance in an element, the less it will bother you (or be blocked completely). Resistances stack.

Texts.Chs: ^yellow;碎裂^reset;：如果你掉落高度过高，落地点的块会因无法承受下落的力量而碎裂。其中包括冰、玻璃、泥、黏液等块。所以请谨慎行事。
Texts.Eng: ^yellow;Tile Breaking^reset;: If you're falling a bit too fast, some tiles will be unable to bear the strain of your weight. Ice, glass, slime, mud and other materials can break on impact. So, watch your step and take care.

Texts.Chs: ^yellow;物块效果^reset;：当你踏上某种物块时，它会产生buff或debuff，这类物块通常并不会高亮显示。雪、泥、丛林泥块和黏土则会降低你的移动速度。而沥青则会提高你在地面的移动速度。另外还有其他多种影响你的方块，如想要彻底了解，请多加探索。
Texts.Eng: ^yellow;Tile Effects^reset;:  Some tiles give buffs or debuffs when stepped on. Many of these will not give indicators, but will affect your movement. Snow, mud, jungle dirt and clay are some examples of this in action. Asphalt increases your ground speed, which is useful in bases. Experiment, and you might find some really useful stuff.

Texts.Chs: ^yellow;天气^reset;：各种各样的天气都会伤害到你。天气能使用相对应的抗性豁免。例如雷电风暴可以用电系抗性豁免，毒液可以用毒系抗性豁免等等。不过也有一些独特的天气，例如以太，你需要从护甲或者EPP模块获得其豁免。
Texts.Eng: ^yellow;Weather^reset;: Various types of weather exist that can cause you harm. All can be resisted with a relevant protection type. Electrical storms are blocked by electric resistance, poison by poison, and so on. Some are less obvious however, such as Aether sickness, which requires specialized immunity from armor or augments.
